function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Connection allocation based on reviewers’ interests and areas of expertise","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inclusion and exclusion criteria for research may not cover all relevant urban contexts related to pandemics of respiratory diseases, leading to a limited scope of the study.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Articles focused on covid-19, spanish influenza, h1n1, and generic ’influenza’ or ’pandemic influenza’ increase the risk of propagating contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inclusion of multiple international contexts, including developed and lmic contexts, increases the risk of global disease spread.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of explicit inclusion of equity considerations in the literature review may perpetuate health disparities and lead to unequal access to healthcare resources.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Global spread of infectious diseases through travel","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate urban planning for infectious disease containment","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation in office and residential buildings","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective health and safety management in residential apartment buildings","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate urban design for open public spaces","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient governance and stakeholder engagement in pandemic-focused urban planning","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective pandemic responses at the local government level","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of institutional coordination across multiple agencies and different jurisdictions","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ethical issues related to communicating risks and responses","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Allocation of scarce resources in socioeconomically different urban areas","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of transparency and public understanding in decision making","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Oversimplification of biological systems in mathematical models","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Airports identified as efficient but expensive for controlling infection spread","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Effectiveness of npis dependent on urban planning and design","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Variable success of npis in different cities and countries","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inequities faced by different social groups in urban settings","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Connectivity between districts impacting mortality during influenza pandemic","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Effect of density and npis on infection rates","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of socioeconomic factors on pandemic spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spatial disparities in transport infrastructure correlated with h1n1 outbreak impacts","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate collaboration across sectors and disciplines","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor integration of pandemic guidance into urban planning","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Intercity and intra city transport systems, airports, ports, and hubs pose essential threats to urban areas and make them vulnerable to pandemics.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close similarities observed between historical guidance and 2007 guidance in pandemic preparedness planning.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Significant and positive association between the frequency of flights, trains, and buses from specific regions and the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Population reflux in labour intensive cities leading to future outbreaks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of bioaerosol samplers in crowded public spaces to monitor respiratory viruses","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Global nature of pandemics requires action at local levels","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Maximizing mobility at street level through urban informatics and data","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of adaptation for remote working and lockdowns in some countries","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Miscommunication of disease prevention measures to diverse communities, leading to confusion and non-compliance.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective enforcement of mandatory face mask use, leading to reduced compliance and increased risk of disease transmission in public transportation settings.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Vulnerable populations at risk due to respiratory pandemics","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of future-oriented urban planning and design post-covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Global interconnectivity of cities leading to the spread of respiratory pandemics","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of urban design responses and mitigation strategies for respiratory pandemics","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate engagement of diverse communities in pandemic planning","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate coverage of equity issues in the literature review","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insufficient research on the role of infrastructure in pandemics","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited scope for developing robust findings from recent experiences with covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient planning and design of infrastructure for halting the spread of pandemics","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neglect of economic potential of infrastructure in preparing or responding to pandemics","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overlooked relationship between infrastructure, agglomeration, and pandemics","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate identification of interventions due to rapid review process.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Incomplete integration of lessons from historical pandemics prior to 1900.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"}]}
